      showID - ID number for the show session
      Returns:

    • bookShow

      public static Transaction bookShow(Cinema chosenCinema, Shows chosenShow, double price, ArrayList<Integer> seatIDs, User loginUser) throws IOException
      Books a movie ticket by assigning selected seats and updating the transaction
      Parameters:
      chosenCinema - chosen cinema hall for the showtime
      chosenShow - chosen showtime for the booking
      price - total price of the booking
      seatIDs - list of unique seat IDs that the user has chosen for the booking
      loginUser - user object
      Returns:
      newly created transaction object with the relevant details
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getCineplexByMovieId

      public static ArrayList<Cineplex> getCineplexByMovieId(int movieId)
      Fetches list of all cineplexes where the movie is being shown
      Parameters:
      movieId - unique ID number for the movie
      Returns:
      list of cineplexes showing the movie

    • getShowsByMovieId

      public static ArrayList<Shows> getShowsByMovieId(int movieID)
      Fetches list of all showtimes for a chosen movie
      Parameters:
      movieID - unique ID number for the chosen movie
      Returns:
      arraylist of all shows

    • getShowsByMovieId

      public static ArrayList<Shows> getShowsByMovieId(int movieID, int option)
      Fetches list of all showtimes within senior/student ticket timing
      Parameters:
      movieID - unique ID number for the chosen movie
      option - option to select senior/student ticket
      Returns:
      arraylist of showtimes

    • isPublicHoliday

      public static boolean isPublicHoliday(Date inputDate)
      Check if a selected date is a public holiday
      Parameters:
      inputDate - chosen date
      Returns:
      boolean value (yes or no)

      public static double getPrice(Shows chosenShow, User loginUser, int option)
      Calculates single ticket price
      Parameters:

      loginUser - user identity object
      option - option for senior/student ticket price
